name: Gandalf
summary: A wizard of the Istari order sent to Middle-earth to aid in the fight against Sauron.

name: Frodo Baggins
summary: A hobbit of the Shire who undertook the quest to destroy the One Ring in Mount Doom.

name: Aragorn
summary: The heir of Isildur and rightful king of Gondor and Arnor, a Ranger of the North.

name: Legolas
summary: An elven prince of the Woodland Realm and member of the Fellowship of the Ring.

name: Gimli
summary: A dwarf warrior and member of the Fellowship of the Ring.

name: Samwise Gamgee
summary: Frodo's loyal companion and gardener who accompanied him on the quest to destroy the Ring.

name: Bilbo Baggins
summary: A hobbit who found the One Ring during his adventure with Thorin's company.

name: Sauron
summary: The primary antagonist, a Dark Lord who created the One Ring to dominate Middle-earth.

name: Saruman
summary: The head of the Istari order who was corrupted and sought the One Ring for himself.

name: Gollum
summary: A corrupted creature obsessed with the One Ring, which he possessed for centuries.

name: The One Ring
summary: The most powerful Ring of Power, created by Sauron to control all other rings.

name: The Shire
summary: The homeland of hobbits in northwest Middle-earth, known for its peaceful rural life.

name: Rivendell
summary: An elven settlement in eastern Eriador, home to Elrond Half-elven.

name: Mordor
summary: Sauron's realm in the southeast of Middle-earth, where Mount Doom is located.

name: Gondor
summary: The southern kingdom of the Dunedain, a major realm of Men in Middle-earth.

name: Moria
summary: An ancient dwarven city and mine beneath the Misty Mountains.

name: Fellowship of the Ring
summary: A group of nine companions who set out to destroy the One Ring.

name: Elrond
summary: The lord of Rivendell, a wise elf who hosted the Council that formed the Fellowship.

name: Mount Doom
summary: A volcano in Mordor where the One Ring was forged and where it must be destroyed.
